remarks: Version of ~ cbv3 with two dv conditions, which does not require ~ ax-11 nor ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbv3v2.v $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-cbv3v2.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbv3v2 $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
